aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: I'm a Front-End Software Developer from Brazil. Since I was a young boy I always loved to understand how things worked and programming is how I can make them work! Lets make something special!

responsive.title: Responsive
responsive.description: My layouts will work on any device, big or small.

dynamic.title: Dynamic
dynamic.description: Websites don't have to be static, I love making pages come to life.

intuitive.title: Intuitive
intuitive.description: Strong preference for easy to use, intuitive UX/UI.

fast.title: Fast
fast.description: Fast load times and lag free interaction, my highest priority.

skills.title: Skills
skills.differentStack: Got a project with a different stack?
